text: “Canada, which had initially ordered 20M doses of the @Pfizer / @BioNTech_Group #vaccine with an option for 56M more, now has a firm deal for 40M doses of the two-shot vaccines.. Trudeau said that between April and June, Canada would have enough doses for 20M people.” 🤔 #COVID19 https://t.co/wPiWQ7qYH1
